body:
I think that avicore should make an app on the Google Play and App  store because latetly since the new avicore its been really hard to view things on the forums. So I thought hey why not make an app for it? It could include the forums, stats of players tips and tricks on games and rundowns of some maps like walls maps. I didn't go to in depth to this but I thought it would be a cool idea especially simplifying the forums for people viewing it on the phone please give me feed back.                            

          danyman2202
   Sorry I made copies of this post it wouldn't let me comment
